mapper.sql: id, session_id, turn_id, role, content, metadata, created_at
mapper.select: SELECT sm.id, sm.session_id, sm.turn_id, sm.role, sm.content, sm.metadata, sm.created_at FROM session_messages sm JOIN session_turns st ON st.id = sm.turn_id WHERE sm.turn_id = #{turnId} AND sm.role = 'ASSISTANT'::message_role_enum AND st.final_response_message_id IS NOT NULL AND sm.id = st.final_response_message_id LIMIT 1
SELECT FROM session_messages WHERE turn_id = #{turnId} AND role = 'ASSISTANT'::message_role_enum ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT FROM session_messages WHERE turn_id = #{turnId} ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT FROM session_messages WHERE session_id = #{sessionId} ORDER BY id ASC
